markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Wash Out](/Feats.aspx?ID=3344) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Poppet" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=418" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 64</row>

</column>

---

Toxins seep out of your artificial body quickly. Each time you succeed at a Fortitude save against an ongoing [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126), you reduce its stage by 2, or by 1 against a [virulent](/Traits.aspx?ID=162) poison. Each critical success you achieve against an ongoing poison reduces its stage by 3, or by 2 against a virulent poison.
name: Wash Out

text: <title level="1" right="Feat 1" pfs="Standard" > Wash Out Source Grand Bazaar pg. 64 --- Toxins seep out of your artificial body quickly. Each time you succeed at a Fortitude save against an ongoing poison, you reduce its stage by 2, or by 1 against a virulent poison. Each critical success you achieve against an ongoing poison reduces its stage by 3, or by 2 against a virulent poison.
